command.value:
powershell "ls"

powershell "Write-Host 'calling Expand-Archive'"


powershell "Expand-Archive -Path svlconv.zip -Destination ."

powershell "Write-Host 'running python svlconv' "

# download files from blob container 

powershell " azcopy copy  'https://rastoracc02.blob.core.windows.net/nms-files-sync-aws?sv=2020-04-08&st=2021-09-30T05%3A36%3A23Z&se=2025-10-01T05%3A36%3A00Z&sr=c&sp=racwdxlt&sig=cpZ5cvnSypBK2MLh4%2B9buGQ%2FOizjqO6Dv8q2svJ4K5Y%3D'   '.\L@{pipeline().parameters.ChunkId}.SVL' --include-pattern L@{pipeline().parameters.ChunkId}.SVL --recursive "

powershell "python ra-SvlConvToText\main.py 'L@{pipeline().parameters.ChunkId}.SVL "

powershell " azcopy copy '.\'         'https://rastoracc02.blob.core.windows.net/nms-files-sync-aws?sv=2020-04-08&st=2021-09-30T05%3A36%3A23Z&se=2025-10-01T05%3A36%3A00Z&sr=c&sp=racwdxlt&sig=cpZ5cvnSypBK2MLh4%2B9buGQ%2FOizjqO6Dv8q2svJ4K5Y%3D'  --include-pattern 'L@{pipeline().parameters.ChunkId}*.json;@{pipeline().parameters.ChunkId}_*.csv'  --recursive "


# upload results to blob container
